pr_title: Allow to create SparseFileTracker with ranges already present

timeline.message: Allow to create SparseFileTracker with ranges already present

timeline.bodyText: Since ranges is a SortedSet we're iterating through them in order, so can we just remember the previous range we added?
timeline.author: DaveCTurner

timeline.bodyText: I think this is impossible, so we may as well just assert added.
timeline.author: DaveCTurner

timeline.bodyText:
Think this is off-by-one 😁

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                        i = end + 2L + randomLongBetween(0L, Math.max(0L, length - end)); // +2 for non contiguous ranges
          
          
            
                        i = end + 1L + randomLongBetween(0L, Math.max(0L, length - end)); // +1 for non contiguous ranges
timeline.author: DaveCTurner
